art_deco_elegance.name: Art Deco Elegance Living Room
art_deco_elegance.description: Sophisticated 1920s-inspired design with geometric patterns and luxury materials
art_deco_elegance.flooring: Black and white geometric marble or herringbone wooden parquet
art_deco_elegance.walls: Deep emerald or sapphire walls with gold geometric wallpaper or panels
art_deco_elegance.ceiling: Coffered ceiling with gold leaf accents and decorative molding
art_deco_elegance.lighting: Crystal chandeliers, brass wall sconces, geometric pendant lights
art_deco_elegance.furniture: Velvet upholstered sofa, mirrored coffee table, brass-legged side tables
art_deco_elegance.decor: Art deco mirrors, geometric throw pillows, sunburst wall art, marble sculptures
art_deco_elegance.style_features: Geometric patterns, symmetry, luxurious textures, bold colors, metallic accents
art_deco_elegance.prompt_keywords: art deco living room, geometric patterns, gold accents, velvet furniture, marble details, 1920s glamour, sophisticated and luxurious

coastal_resort.name: Coastal Resort Living Room
coastal_resort.description: Serene beach-inspired space with light, airy, nautical elements and natural textures
coastal_resort.flooring: Light beige limestone or whitewashed wooden planks
coastal_resort.walls: Soft whites, light seafoam, or sandy beige with subtle wave patterns
coastal_resort.ceiling: Whitewashed wood paneling or light plaster with nautical beams
coastal_resort.lighting: Rattan pendant lights, coastal-themed wall sconces, natural abundant light
coastal_resort.furniture: Light upholstered sofa, driftwood coffee table, wicker side chairs
coastal_resort.decor: Seashell accents, coral centerpieces, maritime artwork, rope details, linen curtains
coastal_resort.style_features: Natural light, ocean colors, weathered textures, nautical themes, relaxed elegance
coastal_resort.prompt_keywords: coastal living room, beach-inspired, light blues and whites, driftwood furniture, nautical decor, serene and breezy, seaside retreat

maximalist_eclectic.name: Maximalist Eclectic Living Room
maximalist_eclectic.description: Bold, vibrant space celebrating color, pattern, and personality with curated collections
maximalist_eclectic.flooring: Mixed patterns with bold geometric carpet or patterned tiles with runners
maximalist_eclectic.walls: Multi-colored wallpaper, mixed patterns, jewel-tone paint with gallery wall
maximalist_eclectic.ceiling: Feature ceiling with bold color, patterns, or artistic murals
maximalist_eclectic.lighting: Ornate chandelier, colored pendant lights, vintage floor lamps, layered lighting

maximalist_eclectic.decor: Gallery walls with mixed artwork, decorative mirrors, sculptures, layered textiles, vintage collectibles
maximalist_eclectic.style_features: Bold colors, mixed patterns, vintage and modern blend, personal collections, theatrical atmosphere
maximalist_eclectic.prompt_keywords: maximalist living room, bold colors, eclectic decor, mixed patterns, colorful furniture, vibrant personality, artistic and expressive

japandi_harmony.name: Japandi Harmony Living Room
japandi_harmony.description: Blending Japanese minimalism with Scandinavian warmth creating balanced, functional elegance
japandi_harmony.flooring: Natural light oak or bamboo flooring with subtle mat accents
japandi_harmony.walls: Soft neutral tones with natural linen or paper-textured wallpaper
japandi_harmony.ceiling: Minimalist flat ceiling with natural wood beams and clean lines
japandi_harmony.lighting: Soft diffused lighting, paper lanterns, warm ambient LED strips, window light
japandi_harmony.furniture: Low-profile wooden sofa, natural wood storage units, woven seating, minimal tables
japandi_harmony.decor: Indoor plants, ikebana-inspired arrangements, natural fiber textiles, zen garden elements

japandi_harmony.prompt_keywords: japandi living room, minimalist design, natural materials, warm neutral tones, zen-inspired, low-profile furniture, serene and balanced

steampunk_industrial.name: Steampunk Industrial Living Room
steampunk_industrial.description: Futuristic yet vintage aesthetic combining Victorian-era elements with industrial machinery
steampunk_industrial.flooring: Polished concrete with metal grating or dark reclaimed wood
steampunk_industrial.walls: Exposed brick with metal pipes, gear wall art, or metallic textured panels
steampunk_industrial.ceiling: Open beam design with visible ductwork, gears, and industrial fixtures
steampunk_industrial.lighting: Brass Edison bulbs, vintage-style industrial chandeliers, neon accent lights
steampunk_industrial.furniture: Leather and metal furniture, repurposed machinery pieces, vintage-inspired metal sofa frame
steampunk_industrial.decor: Exposed gears, vintage clocks, copper pipes, antique machinery parts, leather accents, industrial signage
steampunk_industrial.style_features: Raw metals, vintage machinery, Victorian-industrial blend, functional art, bold textures
steampunk_industrial.prompt_keywords: steampunk industrial living room, exposed brick and metal, vintage machinery decor, Edison bulbs, leather furniture, futuristic retro

bohemian_wanderlust.name: Bohemian Wanderlust Living Room
bohemian_wanderlust.description: Free-spirited, globally-inspired space celebrating travel, art, and unconventional style
bohemian_wanderlust.flooring: Mixed wooden floors with layered colorful rugs and kilim patterns
bohemian_wanderlust.walls: Warm earthy tones with textured paint, tapestries, and world maps

bohemian_wanderlust.prompt_keywords: bohemian living room, earthy colors, layered textiles, indoor plants, world artifacts, boho chic, artistic and free-spirited

monochromatic_contemporary.name: Monochromatic Contemporary Living Room

tropical_glamour.description: Lush, vibrant space merging exotic botanical elements with luxury finishes and bold statement pieces

tropical_glamour.walls: Tropical wallpaper with monstera leaves, bright accent wall, or painted jungle scenes

mid_century_modern.name: Mid-Century Modern Living Room
mid_century_modern.description: Timeless 1950s-60s inspired design emphasizing function, clean lines, and organic forms
mid_century_modern.flooring: Warm wood flooring with geometric or abstract area rugs
mid_century_modern.walls: Soft warm tones, simple geometric wallpaper, or accent walls in mustard or teal
mid_century_modern.ceiling: Low-profile ceiling with warm wood panels and vintage light fixtures
mid_century_modern.lighting: Sputnik chandelier, arc floor lamp, table lamps with tapered legs

luxury_minimalist.name: Luxury Minimalist Living Room
luxury_minimalist.description: High-end sophistication with essential elements, premium materials, and refined restraint
luxury_minimalist.flooring: Large-format marble, premium porcelain, or polished concrete with subtle veining
luxury_minimalist.walls: Off-white, soft beige, or pale grey with subtle texture and premium finishes
luxury_minimalist.ceiling: Minimalist flat ceiling with concealed premium lighting and clean lines
luxury_minimalist.lighting: Designer pendant lights, hidden LED strips, warm sophisticated lighting scheme
luxury_minimalist.furniture: Premium minimalist sofa in linen or leather, marble or stone coffee table, sleek steel frames
luxury_minimalist.decor: Single statement art piece, designer vase, minimal throw pillows, curated accessories
luxury_minimalist.style_features: Premium materials, functional minimalism, subtle luxury, refined elegance, quality over quantity
luxury_minimalist.prompt_keywords: luxury minimalist living room, premium materials, marble flooring, refined simplicity, high-end minimal, sophisticated restraint

gothic_opulent.name: Gothic Opulent Living Room
gothic_opulent.description: Moody, dramatic space with dark elegance, ornate details, and theatrical sophistication
gothic_opulent.flooring: Dark hardwood with ornate area rug or black marble with brass inlays
gothic_opulent.walls: Deep burgundy, charcoal, or black velvet walls with ornate wallpaper and details
gothic_opulent.ceiling: Dark ceiling with elaborate crown molding, ornate chandelier, and dramatic finishes

gothic_opulent.style_features: Deep colors, ornate details, theatrical atmosphere, luxury textures, dramatic elegance
gothic_opulent.prompt_keywords: gothic living room, dark and dramatic, burgundy and black, ornate details, moody atmosphere, theatrical design, sophisticated gothic
